The problem for me is that I can't pass it through my metadata adder program iFlicks nor other converter programs like Handbrake. Never had problems like this with an .mp4 before. If I just stick it in iTunes it does work though, no out of sync issues like some others are reporting.

This episode is awesome, it has slash and kimi R as guest stars!!! . There's Ferrari 250 california as well which is an iconic car. But for me its just something else that s featured in this episode, the true great car of our generation The M5, that makes this episode so special!!!
